body:
Dear Taylor,



In Daysim under the Building Tab you select under Shading Device either
'static shading device (included in geometry)' or your pick one of the
two dynamic blind option. The first case is equivalent to 'no blinds'.



Christoph





[mailto:radiance-general-bounces@radiance-online.org] On Behalf Of
Taylor Sharpe
Sent: Tuesday, April 13, 2010 8:49 PM
To: radiance-general@radiance-online.org


Hey everyone,



I'm brand new to Radiance, and I'm using DAYSim with Google Sketchup.



My first question is simple: does the model always assume that there are
blinds installed in the building?  Is there a way to tell the program
that there are no blinds?  How can I compare a model with blinds to a
model without?



Thanks,

-Taylor Sharpe

-------------- next part --------------
